title: [Forbidden Hills, Grasslands]
description: Oversized fireflies flit about the grassy fields, their round bodies flickering off and on at random intervals.  In the distance, a mist-shrouded mountain towers over the center of the island, its peak barely visible in the moonlight.

Oversized dragonflies flit about the grassy fields, their iridescent bodies shimmering in the sunlight.  Colorful wildflowers dot the hillside, each attracting an assortment of flying insects seeking nectar.   In the distance, a mist-shrouded mountain towers over the center of the island.
